description: Main entry point and app initialization for a Flutter-based finance tracking application, including theme setup and bottom navigation management.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Stateless widget that builds the MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the MaterialApp widget with theme and initial route.

classes.name: MainNavigation
classes.description: Stateful widget managing bottom navigation among main app screens.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes the app with ProviderScope.
